text: Coming up next: Emergency Use Authorization (#EUA) for @BioNTech_Group's #mRNA #vaccine candidate, BNT162b2 against SARS-CoV-2. @US_FDA seems to speed up the process now. European Union's European Medicines Agency (#EMA) to follow at the end of december. Fascinating! #COVID19 https://t.co/13TyWM9vux
